issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Document why join order optimization does not work with filter pushdown
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11029](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11029). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When I run TPC-H query 12, I see that the join order is not optimized to put the smaller table on the left. I added some debug logging and see that the optimization sees row count of None on the left side because there is a filter wrapping the table scan.
